item.title: EP 675 - "The Parable Of The Automobile": Truly Insidious Insanity
item.itunes:title: "The Parable Of The Automobile": Truly Insidious Insanity
item.description:
Today we peel off an alien’s eye, go to a glowing orb convention in a local gas station, and  we explore the insanity called “The Parable Of The Automobile.”

https://imgur.com/gallery/aPN1Fnw

 

Links:

https://www.thinkaboutitdocs.com/1993-april-ufo-alien-sightings/

Found glowing orb people/convention in parking lot.

https://archive.is/tJWwe

https://blogintomystery.com/2012/05/24/peter-parker-was-molested-as-a-boy-fact-i-got-misty-eyed-reading-this-fact-spider-man-and-power-pack/

https://archive.fo/9Lvao#selection-21.0-21.45

https://www.fresnobee.com/news/local/crime/article247972310.html?utm_source=knewz

A pedophilia website operator has been arrested in the kidnapping of a 12-year-old California girl

https://www.cnn.com/2020/12/20/us/virginia-kidnapping-12-year-old-fresno-denver/index.html?utm_source=knewz

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nathan_Larson_(politician)

https://www.huffpost.com/entry/nathan-larson-congressional-candidate-pedophile_n_5b10916de4b0d5e89e1e4824

https://truecrimedaily.com/2020/12/20/virginia-pedophilia-advocate-arrested-at-denver-airport-with-12-year-old-california-girl/
